items.titolo: Use ChatGPT for medical advice? Try its new Health mode - here's how
items.descrizione: ChatGPT Health is OpenAI's new 'dedicated experience' that taps into your medical records for all your health questions. Here's how it works.

items.titolo: Google Gemini Is Taking Control of Humanoid Robots on Auto Factory Floors
items.descrizione: Google DeepMind and Boston Dynamics are teaming up to integrate Gemini into a humanoid robot called Atlas.
